scripts.all: start npm run astro | start npm run react | start npm run svelte | start npm run solid | start npm run vue | start npm run vanila
scripts.react: npm --prefix ./react/ run build && npm --prefix ./react/ run preview
scripts.svelte: npm --prefix ./svelte/ run build && npm --prefix ./svelte/ run preview
scripts.solid: npm --prefix ./solid/ run build && npm --prefix ./solid/ run serve
scripts.vue: npm --prefix ./vue/ run build && npm --prefix ./vue/ run serve
